verses.verse: "Dominion<WH4910> and awe<WH6343> belong to Him Who establishes<WH6213> peace<WH7965> in His heights.<WH4791>
"Is there<WH3426> any<WH3426> number<WH4557> to His troops<WH1416>? And upon whom<WH4310> does His light<WH216> not rise<WH6965>?
"How<WH4100> then can a man<WH582> be just<WH6663> with God<WH410>? Or how<WH4100> can he be clean<WH2135> who is born<WH3205> of woman<WH802>?
"If<WH2005> even<WH5704> the moon<WH3394> has<WH166> no<WH3808> brightness<WH166> And the stars<WH3556> are not pure<WH2141> in His sight,<WH5869>
How<WH637> much<WH637> <WH3588> less<WH637> man,<WH582> [that] maggot,<WH7415> And the son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> [that] worm!<WH9641>"
